meanings.definition: In a manner that shows excessive confidence or belief in one's abilities or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: He walked overconfidently into the exam room, sure he would ace the test.
meanings.sent2: She overconfidently claimed she could solve any problem thrown her way.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overconfidently tried to jump from one tree to another but missed and fell comically.
meanings.sent4: The knight charged overconfidently at the dragon, only to be swiftly defeated.
meanings.sent5: The actor overconfidently ad-libbed his lines, forgetting his part in the play.
